name: Flooding
description: If a car, while staying in its lane, has to drive through several inches or more of water.

name: No Flooding
description: If a car, while staying in its lane, does not have to drive through water.

name: Bad Image
description: If you cannot see the roadway in an image (i.e., the image is dark, bad weather, camera is not working, rain on the camera lens, etc.)
